title: Characteristics of sound and light waves

content.question: Which of the following is characteristic of both sound and light waves?

choices.label: They travel with the same velocity.
They give rise to interference effects.

content.answer: They give rise to interference effects.

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
